constituent: location, soil, dirt, ground, piggy bank, sun, day, piglets
hint: You´re looking for a good location to bury your piggy bank savings. It has to be in some soft soil that´s easy to dig up, well hidden, and easy to remember like this kanji.
koohiiStory1: You´re looking for a good location to bury your piggy bank savings. It has to be in some soft soil that´s easy to dig up, well hidden, and easy to remember like this kanji.
koohiiStory2: Don´t confuse with place (#1127). Think of location not as a single fixed spot, but as the act of locating. You´ve buried your piggy bank in the dirt in your backyard, but you can´t remember where. You frantically dig everywhere in a process of location to find your piggy bank.
myStory: vị trí. ko phải cấp độ. ko phải độ rộng. đất mở có vị trí
